::Prowl::

Prowl frowns slightly, watching Iron Raptor walk around the room in a 
wide circle, trying to think of what she could be doing. Scanning her 
didn't cross his mind at all, the Maximal deciding on another course 
of action.

"Love," he says to her, "If you promise not to tear anyone apart on 
the way to the lab, we can get you checked out and see what's going 
on."

He looks at her, watching her movements as he tries to think of what 
could be wrong with her.






--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Megan Solmonson" <tmrattrap@h...> wrote:
> * She tensed as Prowl came closer to her, but noting the concern in 
his 
> eyes.
> But she pulls her head away as he tries to pat her head, only 
pacing in a 
> wider circle around the room.
> 
> Though, didn't he understand? How she couldn't possably know how to 
> transform or even speak?
> It was impossable to communicate to him that she needed his help, 
not his 
> verble selutions.
> 
> All he needed to do was scan her, that was it. Then he would know 
just what 
> was going on, that her beast modes had screwed up all of her main 
systems.
> 
> But, even as she thought this, the rage and bloodlust of her modes 
was 
> building. And she could feel her addrenalin rising, and that was 
> bad...really bad.
> 
> She stopped and simply stayed there with her head bowed a bit, 
looking 
> towards Prowl and simply watching him...still mewing softly.
> However, almost every mew sounded as if she were saying Help Me.
> And if she didn't get out of this mode soon, there wouldn't be a 
thing in 
> this world that could help her then.*
